column6:
Comfortable 1/1 Condo located next to Schlitterbahn Beach Resort and Schlitterbahn Waterpark. 2 Queen Beds and Sofa Bed; sleeps 6. Full kitchen/full bath. Family friendly location; Schlitterbahn discounts tickets available in the Clubhouse. We want to be competitive, let us know if you find a better rate.
SPI Occupancy tax rate is 17%.
Airbnb is collecting 6%.
11% ADDED to nightly rate.

2016-XZDSYD
column9: Pool+Hot Tubs+BBQ Grills+EZ Beach Access+Free WIFI
